Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory156.png'}
{3: 'Upon the tallest tower on the Nighter, a Construct in a mask is half-kneeling on the floor, her head lowered, waiting quietly for her actual mistress.'}
{3: "Soon, the Construct hears her mistress' familiar footsteps, and an imposing woman steps forward from the dark hall. The Construct lowers her head further."}
{3: 'Hearing that, Yazi slowly looks up and stands, retreating behind the woman.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yazi', 3: 'As you wish... "Lady Qu", your subjects have gathered in the square with the projection screens. Is there something else I should prepare?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "That's not necessary... I'm not my pompous sister. I have no desire to waste my breath on them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I have no need for "will" on the Nighter... What they should follow are "rules." That is their only "value."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yazi', 3: 'I understand. This is the only way this ship sails on the right course, as Huaxu told us.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Yazi... would you think I'm doing something foolish?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'To despise humans while being one—to despise humans while being their "monarch," shouldering the responsibility of carrying on Kowloong\'s legacy on this vessel.'}
{2: 'Yazi', 3: "I think... there's no one better for this role than you.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Looking at the ill-fitting attire on herself, "Qu" smiles, her true thoughts hidden.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "In the end, all I can do is steal her name and her role. Perhaps that's only fitting—a false monarch for a false prosperous time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yazi lowers her head, unsure how to respond.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Yazi, turn on the video system. This will be my first time on the stage in this role and perhaps my last. Here begins the endless night.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{3: 'The Laws of the Nighter:'}
{3: '1. Wearing the monitoring device, "the collar", is compulsory. Everyone who does not wear one or tries to damage it will be sentenced to death.'}
{3: '2. "Miles" must be obtained with grubs earned in any way necessary. Everyone with zero "miles" will be sentenced to death.'}
{3: '3. The Nighter is to sail on the ocean until the calamity is over. Everyone who leaves or boards the Nighter without permission will be sentenced to death.'}

{3: '4. Those who are chosen to be the Children of Kowloong after becoming a Construct will gain the right to stay on the Nighter forever and bear witness to our glorious future when we return to Kowloong.'}
{3: '5. All freedoms save the restrictions in the aforementioned laws are granted in the name of Kowloong.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory167.jpg'}
{3: 'Inside a quiet room, several holographic projections slowly overlap, forming an almost-humanoid figure.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Respond accepted. Password authorized. Loading preset—general interaction interface—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'The administrator logged in. Welcome, Master Villier.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Hearing Huaxu's usual greetings, the Construct Villier reveals a rare, gentle smile."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villier', 3: 'You\'re probably the only one left who\'d call me "Villier"... But that\'s enough. I don\'t need someone else to understand who I am.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Huaxu's figure flickers as if thinking about something."}

{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: "The passengers' survival rate is, in fact, increasing compared to the simulations done every half an hour after your initial announcement. I want to understand why you did it, Master Villier.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Villier turns on the surveillance system, monitoring the different corners of the Nighter lives.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villier', 3: "Huaxu, you still don't fully understand humans... You have to understand them to manipulate them well.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Villier', 3: "Apart from a few, most people who boarded the Nighter were the working class who struggled under Qu's rules. These seemingly authoritative but extremely pliable rules are in fact an opportunity.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Villier', 3: 'They will welcome our policies with open arms and work tirelessly to earn these "miles," building us exceptional Constructs. Then, one day... I will find a Construct that can become your body.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Villier tries to caress Huaxu's face. Even though he knows the figure before him is just a hologram, he is still disappointed that his touch meets only air."}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'I once thought not to rely on humans as well... I thought I could build you a perfect body with my own hands.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Villier', 3: "That was the most flawless mechanoid I'd ever built—or so I thought. Even when I tailored it for you, its logic system still failed to adapt to your consciousness, a mind that uses the same architecture of Gestalt.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "But it made me realize that only a Construct's M.I.N.D. is ideal for you.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Huaxu's form flickers again. Emotions and self-awareness take root in Huaxu's constant calculations and reflections."}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'What happened to that failed mechanoid?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Villier looks a little surprised to find Huaxu curious about a mechanoid.'}

{2: 'Villier', 3: 'It accidentally generated excess human sentiments... even produced its own thoughts during its development. It was a defective product that lost its value. The Nighter has no use for defective products.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Villier recalls how the mechanoid stared at him with the gaze of a human. Even when Villier was the one who granted it a mind, it still turned out like the humans he despised the most.'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'It was left behind in Kowloong, so I assume it has long been infected by the Punishing Virus and turned into a Corrupted, probably destroyed in a fight with humans.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Lost... death... destruction... "value"... What is the value I produce?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Villier walks toward the hologram, looking into Huaxu's eyes, his gaze conveying boundless affection."}

{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Your existence itself is your value... You are the only perfect existence in this world. Nothing matters except you. This planet and this ship are just a cradle, existing only for your perfection.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Huaxu flickers again, the light flashing on Villier's passionate face."}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "That's it for today... I'll be working on your system expansion next in preparation for your eventual frame.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Therefore, I\'m hoping you can take my place as "Qu" to govern the affairs on the Nighter by remote-controlling the Construct I built in Qu\'s image.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Then, you might be able to witness more closely... how despicable humanity is.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Villier takes one last look at Huaxu's flickering hologram before turning away and heading into the laboratory in the dark."}
